overview: Witness the most extreme big mountain lines from Colorado, Alaska, Wyoming, Utah, and California without the risk of death or frostbite in a release that allows viewers to experience the heart-stopping thrill of the drop from the safety of their own homes. As experienced veterans such as Robb Gaffney, Kip Garr, and J.T Holmes match skills with such skilled up-and-comers as Kyle O'Neal and Cody Townsend, the pace of the backcountry picks up thanks to the musical contributions of Earwig, Fire Sermon, Flogging Mary, and man others.
title: Lines of Influence
